item.title: 01 DMIR
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Acknowledgements
item.description: I own a great debt to my family first and foremost, for their invariant understanding and support. To my parents, Yipeng Chen (陈轶鹏) and Chuhua Lin (林春华), for their endless love and tolerance. They are the great parents who always left me with the best, playing their crucial role in paving the way for my future. I would like to say to them my inner love where I incomparably treasure the time when I can still be with them in the rest of their lives.

item.title: Blogs (on Chinese)
item.description: Since a repetition of the same life from its beginning is not to be expected, the next thing most like living one’s life over again seems to be a recollection of that life, and to make that recollection as durable as possible by putting it down in writing. But this may be read or not as any one pleases. I desire with all humility to acknowledge that, in fact, I owe the happiness of my past life to the kind providence of God.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Hi there! I am an undergraduate student who are currently seeking for engaging a MS or PhD program as to neuroscience in fall, 2025. I received a BS in computer science this summer from GDUT (Guangdong University of Technology, Guangzhou) where I have experienced a two-year research internship in a lab that focus on the interface between Causal Inference and Artificial Intelligence. May. 2024 - Present Preparation for the 2025 Graduate Admission Note: I am mainly preparing for the TOFEL and GRE test during these period; I am also looking for reaching out internship opportunities (> 6 months) about computational neuroscience.

item.title: Math Support
item.description: Eureka supports the rendering of mathematical formulas by using KaTeX.

item.title: Work
item.description: My career pursuit — solving engineering problems and digging in research interest — has its roots in brain science, with the primary scientific ideation I incline to be both computational and mathematical. For example, resorting to artificial intelligence or machine learning might enhance our ability to simulate and unravel complex neural capabilities; modelling based on theoretical maths (or physics) might allow us to better describe and simplify specific brian functions. Projects Sep. 2023 – Apr. 2024 A Primer on Causal Diagram Learning (Popularization of Science and Technology)
